channel.title: Mac Compiling
channel.description:
I need someone to teach me how to Compile my Server on Mac, I keep getting the error,
-bash: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe: command not found
After typing in Terminal, "Cd (Dragging my Server here)" Pressing enter, and type in my Compile which is
@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Any help whatsoever would be AMAZING!

item.title: Mac Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Evaur Evaur
item.description:
@Evaur wrote:

I need someone to teach me how to Compile my Server on Mac,
I keep getting the error,

-bash: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe: command not found

After typing in Terminal, “Cd (Dragging my Server here)” Pressing enter,
and type in my Compile which is

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Any help whatsoever would be AMAZING!

Read full topic
